Translations.Text: Wigi d issekniyen n Tezmamt tuuwibt
d nnhaya u d aeunu i iaaoviyen
wid ibedden i teallit, ipzekkin, ipputebbten af laxeot
Wigi, di nnhaya s$uo Mass nnsen. Wigi, d isaadiyen
Ger yimdanen, wid ippa$en awal n zzhu, iwakken ad nnetlafen seg ubrid n Oebbi, war tamusni. U fellas ttihin. I wigi, aaaqeb isdullun
Ma mlan as issekniyen nneÂ£, ad ibren s tem$weo, amzun ur asen isli, amzun aaegen as imeeeu$en. Xebbeo it s uaaqeb aqeoean
Ih, i wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, leonanat isaadiyen
Degsen ad wekkoen. Lemaahda n Oebbi d tidep. Neppa d Uzmir, d Bab n uuwab
Ixleq igenwan, war tigejda ara twalim. Irra di tmurt idurar, iwakken ur tepzenzil ara yiswen. Iwezzaa, degs, yal lxelq. Nessader ed aman seg igenni. Nessem$i d degs, yal tayuga tukyist
Wagi d lxelq n Oebbi. Sseknet iyi d, acu d xelqen wid ur nelli d Neppa. Xaii, imednas atnan di ttelfan n uuee
